segments.text: Have you decided what you ’ re going to do during your holiday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ m going to travel around Europe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , that sounds great ! Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I will start off in Paris . Then I ’ m going to take the train to Nice and then go on to Milan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh that will be lovely . You ’ ll be able to do lots of shopping I expect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes and try lots of new food too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . Make sure you buy me a souvenir !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , don ’ t worry , I will !
segments.speaker: S2
